sobrenosotros.description_part1: Felo Divers is a company of professional divers passionate about the marine world that inspires you to dive better: with technique, conscience and respect for the sea, the island and its culture. Our passion is to take more and more Divers to the ocean floor so they can discover the magic it holds, and so that through our daily actions we can all contribute to the care and protection of marine life.
sobrenosotros.description_part2: Felo Divers House is the only diving house 100% dedicated to diving in the region, where you don't just get certified or dive: you live a complete and transformative experience. We are proud to offer comfortable accommodation in our facilities and authentic food prepared by local hands that maintain the culinary essence of our islands. Here, diving is a way of life and we want you to live it from the moment you arrive. Come discover why thousands of divers choose us every year to live their most memorable underwater adventure.

destinations.title: WHY DIVE IN
destinations.p1: San Andr√©s Islands (SAI) is one of the most incredible diving destinations in the Caribbean. Its coral reefs, diverse marine life and crystal clear waters make it an underwater paradise.
destinations.p2: Providencia offers an even wilder and more authentic experience, with virgin diving sites, deep waters and exceptional marine biodiversity. Here you will find everything from colorful reefs to encounters with reef sharks.
destinations.p3: With more than 365 days of diving per year and optimal conditions for most of the year, these islands offer you the opportunity to explore the underwater world in its fullest expression. From beginners to advanced divers, there is something for everyone.
destinations.p4: It's not just diving, it's a transformative experience that connects you with nature, local culture and inspires you to protect our oceans.

reviews.title: WHAT OUR
reviews.cta: Join thousands of satisfied divers. Come and create your own story with us!

sobre_nosotros.title: ABOUT US
sobre_nosotros.description: Felo Divers is a company of professional divers passionate about the marine world. Our passion is to take more and more Divers to the ocean floor so they can discover the magic it holds, and so that through our daily actions we can all contribute to the care and protection of marine life.
sobre_nosotros.experience: 20 years of learning and growing as divers give us the capacity today to guide, accompany and lead diving trips, experiences and certifications.
